Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Pleurocidin-like peptide AP2 (NRC-12; fish, chordates, animals; Predicted)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Aeromonas salmonicida 99-1 (MIC=2 µg/ml), A. salmonicida 97-4 (MIC=2 µg/ml), Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium MS7953s (MIC=2 µg/ml), S. enterica serovar Typhimurium 14028s (MIC=8µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa K799 (MIC=4 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa Z61 (MIC=1 µg/ml), Escherichia coli CGSC 4908 (MIC=2 µg/ml), E. coli UB1005 (MIC=8 µg/ml), E. coli DC2 (MIC=2 µg/ml);Gram-positive bacteria:S. epidermidis C621 (MIC=8 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) C623 (MIC=16 µg/ml).Yeast:Candida albicans C627 (MIC=4 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Novel antimicrobial peptides derived from flatfish genes.
Literature.Author: Patrzykat A, Gallant JW, Seo JK, Pytyck J, Douglas SE.
